summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Crypto Arbitrage Bot with fail-safe arbitrage feature. Backend APIs 100% working (17/17 tests passed). Frontend UI functional with all modals and navigation working. One missing feature identified: fail-safe settings not displayed in Settings modal UI.

missing_features.issue: Fail-safe arbitrage settings (target_sell_spread, spread_check_interval, max_wait_time) are implemented in backend but NOT displayed in the Settings modal UI
missing_features.details: Backend returns these settings via GET /api/settings and accepts updates via PUT /api/settings, but the frontend SettingsModal.jsx does not render input fields for these parameters

action_items: Add fail-safe settings UI to SettingsModal.jsx - need input fields for: target_sell_spread (%), spread_check_interval (seconds), max_wait_time (seconds)
critical_code_review_comments: SettingsModal.jsx is missing fail-safe arbitrage configuration fields that are already implemented in the backend BotSettings model (lines 387-400 in server.py)

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all UI working, missing fail-safe settings display)

test_credentials: None required - using public API endpoints
seed_data_creation: Test tokens and exchanges created during testing were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs fully functional with MongoDB. All CRUD operations for tokens, exchanges, wallet work correctly. Settings API returns fail-safe parameters (target_sell_spread=85%, spread_check_interval=10s, max_wait_time=3600s). Frontend modals all open/close correctly. Main gap: SettingsModal.jsx needs UI for fail-safe settings.

backend: Settings GET with fail-safe params - PASS
frontend: Settings modal - PASS (but missing fail-safe fields)
